messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How do you "do" summer?
messages.msgSnippet: 65??? I m so envious. Although I d probably say in that weather F*** it s cold! I m just thankful it s only in the 90 s today. I know 115 is right around the
messages.messageBody:
65??? I'm so envious. Although I'd probably say in
that weather "F*** it's cold!" I'm just thankful it's
only in the 90's today. I know 115 is right around the
corner, and I'll be feeling like the wicked witch "I'm
melting!"

Have fun.

Danie

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How do you "do" summer?
messages.msgSnippet: ... ...thank you so much for bringing up such a painful subject. While you re at it, why don t you give me a nice paper cut and pour lemon juice on it? --
messages.messageBody:
On 6/11/06, Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> "Summers look just like winters but it's hot. (At least here in
> Florida LOL!) "
>
> I just woke up this morning and someone had opened the bedroom window.
> A cool breeze is blowing in...probably about 65 degrees outside right
> now and I just thought "GAWD I'm glad we left P'cola!!":)
>

"...thank you so much for bringing up such a painful subject. While
you're at it, why don't you give me a nice paper cut and pour lemon
juice on it?"


--
Michelle
aka Melbrigða
http://eventualknitting.blogspot.com
MedHS@yahoogroups.com - Homeschooling for the Medieval Recreationist

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How do you "do" summer?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Summers look just like winters but it s hot. (At least here in Florida LOL!)  I just woke up this morning and someone had opened the bedroom window. A
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----

"Summers look just like winters but it's hot. (At least here in
Florida LOL!) "

I just woke up this morning and someone had opened the bedroom window.
A cool breeze is blowing in...probably about 65 degrees outside right
now and I just thought "GAWD I'm glad we left P'cola!!":)

'Course there was marble-sized hail last night!!

-=-=-=-

Sorry, darling---you're heading down to 100 degree weather here today!

Killer!

I've been out in the garden since 7:00-ish to try to beat the heat.

~Kelly, sweltering

messages.subject: How do you "do" summer?
messages.msgSnippet: Summers look just like winters but it s hot. (At least here in Florida LOL!)  I just woke up this morning and someone had opened the bedroom window. A cool
messages.messageBody:
"Summers look just like winters but it's hot. (At least here in
Florida LOL!) "

I just woke up this morning and someone had opened the bedroom window.
A cool breeze is blowing in...probably about 65 degrees outside right
now and I just thought "GAWD I'm glad we left P'cola!!":)

'Course there was marble-sized hail last night!!

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: How do you "do" summer?
messages.msgSnippet: how do you do your summer break? Or, how do you stop school for the summer? All YEAR is a summer break!!! Unschoolers aren t doing school of any kind....so
messages.messageBody:
"how do you do your summer break? Or, how do
you stop "school" for the summer?"

All YEAR is a summer break!!!
Unschoolers aren't doing school of any kind....so why would anything
change in the summer (other than the fact that everything is more
crowded during weekdays now!).

Why would you think summer is any different than the rest of the year
if you're simply doing what you love, whenever you want?

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
